main_definition: Relating to or involving elections, especially political ones.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Concerning the electoral process or procedures used in conducting elections
meanings_and_examples.example: The country implemented new electoral laws to ensure a fair voting system.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Relating to voters and their participation in an election
meanings_and_examples.example: The turnout at the electoral event was impressive, with many citizens exercising their right to vote.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Pertaining to political parties or candidates during a campaign period before elections
meanings_and_examples.example: The electoral speeches of the candidates were broadcasted nationwide in the lead-up to the election day.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Relating to ballots, voting systems, and other mechanisms used for conducting an election
meanings_and_examples.example: Electronic voting machines are being considered as a more efficient electoral tool.
